wikipedia_page.main: William Millar (24 July 1924, Irvine – March 1995, Hyndburn) was a Scottish professional footballer.  He played for Aberdeen, Partick Thistle, Stirling Albion, Swindon Town, Gillingham and Accrington Stanley between 1946 and 1957.
